name: SpaceGaming
description:
Hey there!

SpaceGaming is a simple space invader inspirered game.

Endless wave spawner, in-game shop for buying upgrades on weapon and ship.

Feedback will be appreciated. 

Enjoy

Credits:

Will Tice for https://untiedgames.itch.io/five-free-pixel-explosions

Sounds from Freesound.org and Pixabay.com
